items.sentence: Have you ever thought about how much you have to be grateful for?
Things happened quite differently from the way Tom said they did.

I know that it's highly unlikely that we'll see any whales today.
A few months ago, Tom couldn't walk. Now he's walking quite well.

Tom's health has gradually deteriorated over the past six months.
Snakes, turtles, lizards, alligators and crocodiles are reptiles.

When I said that the airplane wasn't safe, no one listened to me.

I'll lend you any book that I have, as long as you keep it clean.

I don't think that Tom knows what time Mary woke up this morning.
I don't think that Tom knows what time Mary is planning to leave.
